item.title: Call for Contributors
item.description: Let’s build the Rust Blockchain community together! Since the first publication of the Rust in Blockchain newsletter, I have been receiving great feedback â€” people are excited about the potential of Rust blockchain projects uniting together to create a greater community. When I started this newsletter just a few months ago, I didn’t imagine I would so quickly get so much encouraging support from people all over the world, including Germany, Italy, England, the US, and China.
